resources.string: Clicking this button will take you to the menu for creating a trip. A trip consist of a set of chosen locations which you want to visit.
Click this button to go to a view presenting a list of all locations created by you.
Map is there for you to choose coordinates for your location - simply click on the map in a desired location, and a small marker will be displayed.
In this view you have following fields to fill:
Address is made from four fields:
If all provided information is correct, a green toast will appear on top of the screen and you will be redirected to Main Menu.
Otherwise read toast will appear, providing information about what you need to fill in to successfuly create a location.
With using trip creator you are able to set and create new trip. In the creator it would be possible to set all important settings including adding locations to visit for each day of the trip.

On this page of the creator you can pick name for the trip and provide custom description. Moreover, here you must set start and end date of the trip. It is important since next page uses the information about number of days. You are also asked to choose TravelMode and DistanceUnit
